Overview: Sun, sand, nightlife and Portuguese charm along Goa’s coastline.
Hotel_Examples: Resort Rio Residency, Whispering Palms Beach Resort
Inclusions: 3★ stay with breakfast, airport transfers, Goa city & South Goa tour, beach party night
Exclusions: Flights, meals other than breakfast, personal expenses
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & Beach | Day 2: North Goa tour & nightlife | Day 3: South Goa sightseeing | Day 4: Water sports | Day 5: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Young groups wanting beaches, parties & local food
SEO_Title: Goa Party & Beach Break | 4-Night Budget Getaway
SEO_Description: Experience Goa’s beaches and nightlife on a 4-night economical package with beachside stays, tours and transfers included.
SEO_Keywords: Goa trip, beach holiday Goa, Goa nightlife package

Overview: Snow-capped peaks, river valleys and adventure in the Himalayas.
Hotel_Examples: The Orchard Retreat, Snow Valley Resorts
Inclusions: 3★ stay with half board, Solang Valley activities (paragliding/zipline), Rohtang pass sightseeing (subject to permits), local transfers
Exclusions: Transport from origin city, permits, personal gear
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Reach Manali | Day 2: Old Manali & Hadimba Temple | Day 3: Solang Valley activities | Day 4: Rohtang/Atal Tunnel region | Day 5: Local markets | Day 6: Depart
SEO_Title: Manali Adventure Trip | Solang Valley & Rohtang Pass | 5 Nights
SEO_Description: Conquer Solang Valley activities and explore Rohtang-region scenery on a 6-day Manali adventure package with comfortable mountain stays.
SEO_Keywords: Manali trip, Solang Valley paragliding, Rohtang pass tour

Overview: Tropical island life with snorkeling, lively markets and island hopping.

SEO_Keywords: Phuket package, Phi Phi island tour, Phuket snorkeling

Overview: Neon-lit skyscrapers, shrines, sushi and high-tech city life.

Inclusions: 4★ city hotel with breakfast, guided city tours (Asakusa, Shibuya, Akihabara), half-day Mt. Fuji & Hakone trip (optional), airport transfers (NRT/HND)
Exclusions: International flights, Japan rail pass (if needed), visa
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & Shinjuku | Day 2: Asakusa & Ueno | Day 3: Akihabara & Harajuku | Day 4: Mt. Fuji/Hakone day trip | Day 5: Tsukiji & shopping | Day 6: Depart

SEO_Description: Discover Tokyo’s neighborhoods, shrines and food scene on a 6-day guided urban package including an optional Mt. Fuji day trip.

Overview: Alpine vistas, crystal lakes and cable-car panoramas.

Exclusions: International flights, Swiss travel card optional

Overview: Big-five wildlife safaris, immersive lodges and African sunsets.

SEO_Description: Experience Kenya’s Masai Mara on a luxury safari with daily game drives, lodge comforts and cultural visits during the migration season.

Overview: Adventure capital with bungee, lakes and scenic fjords.
